entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
